HERO.TITLE: Kanban board
HERO.DESCRIPTION: The kanban board application will help you break down your tasks into small ones and see the progress of completed tasks, so you can achieve your goals efficiently and without wasting time.

LISTITEM.UNLIMITED: Unlimited number of tasks in the project
LISTITEM.ADDTASK: Ability to add and remove tasks at any time
LISTITEM.SAVEPROJECTS: Ability to save and load projects

PARTICIPATED.PAVEL: Pavel Korshunau, Teamlead. Implemented Authorization, registration, edit user page, backend manipulation, routing, toasts, confirmation modal
PARTICIPATED.STANISLAV: Stanislav Kolpakov. Implemented add/edit/delete boards/column/tasks, drag and drop, add users in project
PARTICIPATED.GREG: Greg Martinos. Implemented header, footer, welcome, projects pages, dark/light mode, localization

COURSE.TITLE: About course
COURSE.DESCRIPTION: The course is intended for RS School 2021Q3 students who have passed RS School stage #2, as well as for new students who have knowledge and practical experience in using the following technologies and tools JavaScript, TypeScript, Git, GitHub, NPM, Webpack, CSS3 / HTML5, Chrome DevTools, Figma, REST API.

FREE.TITLE: Free education
FREE.DESCRIPTION: The principle of 'Pay it forward' works at RS School. We share our knowledge with students for free now, hoping that in the future they will return to us as mentors and pass on their knowledge to the next generation of students in the same way.

PERIOD.TITLE: Training term: 2 months
PERIOD.DESCRIPTION: A recording of the webinar will be posted on the school's YouTube channel.

FOR.TITLE: For evryone
FOR.DESCRIPTION: Everyone can study at RS School, regardless of age, professional employment and place of residence.

SERTIFICATE.TITLE: Certificate
SERTIFICATE.DESCRIPTION: A certificate is issued to all those who successfully complete the course.

MODAL.TITLE: Confirm action
MODAL.QUESTION: Are you sure you want to perform this action?

LOGIN-FORM.TITLE: Sign In
LOGIN-FORM.LOGIN_INPUT_ERROR: Login must be at least 3 characters long
LOGIN-FORM.PASSWORD_INPUT_ERROR: Password must be at least 8 characters long
